subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia will save about $6.5 million against the salary cap by releasing Cary Williams, who was signed as a free agent in 2013 and started all 32 games over the last two seasons.
snippet: Philadelphia will save about $6.5 million against the salary cap by releasing Cary Williams, who was signed as a free agent in 2013 and started all 32 games over the last two seasons.
